1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: One crew gets the call to help a boy who has dislocated his elbow in a boating accident in one of the busiest channels in South Florida. Another crew responds to a call for a heart attack victim and must battle harsh sea conditions to save him.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: One crew responds to a call for a woman with a possible spine injury. The woman is on a boat in a crowded recreation area, and the firefighters have to be careful during the transfer to Fireboat 1, where one false move could be disastrous.

3.title: First Call
3.plot: The crew battles treacherous conditions and scales a massive freighter to save its captain who is suffering from chest pains. And a family fears electrocution when their anchor gets stuck on a mysterious underwater cable.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: During his first call as Officer in Charge of the Fireboat, Lt. Reyes leads his team to save a 26-year-old patient who suffers a sudden, unexplained cardiac arrest. Another crew races against time searching for possible survivors in a submerged car.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: One fireboat crew rushes to the aid of three young men injured in a violent car crash on a bridge over the intercoastal. A call comes in for a boat with an 80-gallon fuel leak in its hull, and firefighters must board what is essentially a live bomb.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: One crew rushes to a vicious yacht fire, and their rookie operator is put to the test maneuvering against the wind and changing currents.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: DANGER COAST follows the dramatic exploits of Miami-Dade County's elite waterborne Marine Operations Bureau as they fight against overwhelming odds to selflessly protect the public at large, while risking their own lives.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: A cruise ship must shock a patient to stabilize his heart before the Fireboat can get him to shore. A ship worker has severely cut his thumb using a drill press, and the crew must act fast to avoid amputation.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The Fireboat must save two victims badly injured in a head-on collision. Another crew searches in the black of night for stranded jet skiers.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A 72-foot shrimp boat sinks in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean, and the crew must find the passengers drifting in the darkness. The Fireboat, Coast Guard and Air Rescue search for two divers missing for over two hours.

imdb.title: Danger Coast
plot: _Danger Coast_ (qv) follows the dramatic exploits of Miami-Dade County's elite waterborne Marine Operations Bureau as they engage in unexpected, life-saving activities that no training or experience could prepare them for.
